about_the_game:
A Tower Defense game, where geometric shapes face each other, and you, the Leader of the Order, must carefully plan your time and money to defeat enemies. With a minimalist design, this is the game for those looking to relax and at the same time train their agility and logical thinking.

In this Tower Defense, you will be the leader of the Symmetrical Order, a group of geometric shapes that seek simplicity and cohesion in their layouts, and for that, they will defend their way of thinking fighting the Asymmetric Gang.

  • Towers with different abilities.
  • Tower upgrades.
  • Attacks in waves.
  • Assorted maps.
  • New level, new challenges.
  • Strategy, agility, and time management will be your best allies.

name: Shape TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
